website_summaries.verdict: The best that Tupperware has to offer – the set's versatility, functionality, and practical design stands above the rest.
pros: Provides optimal protection from moisture and reliable sealing action
Includes 4 spacious pieces with stackable space-saving design and lid vents
cons: An expensive set, but it's an investment that will provide years of kitchen storage

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to friends and strangers
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to gift for any house warming party. I have two sets. They are cheaper on Amazon than the actual Tuberware sight. I am not sure what kind of magic is used to keep the fruits and vegetables fresh for weeks on end but I haven't thrown a thing away. I would recommend this friends and strangers!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Ellison

customer_reviews.title: EXTENDING THE FRESHNESS !
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this tupperware product. I used to end up throwing lettuce and other veggies away because I could not use them fast enough. I put romaine in one and it stayed fresh almost indefinitely. Amazing! Same for green onions ! I don't like the way the flavor on green onions changes in just a few days, but in the tupperware, it maintains its freshness. I've also tried strawberries and yellow squash. I'm a believer !! The other benefit is that the pictures on the containers and on the instructions have educated me. For instance, carrots can be left in any seal container, so now I know when to use products I already had. I am a very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Grateful for the new technology, but if you've been to the supermarket and looked at the packaging, you'd see, your containers are much too small. I bought the set of four, and despite that, I had to break in half the carrots and parsnips; turnips and beets took up an entire container, no room left for other veggies; and salad left no room for other greens, despite I followed your recommendations. These small containers require going to the market every 3rd day to restock. Please make larger ones, for which I'd be willing to pay.
customer_reviews.author: I. K.

customer_reviews.title: The only bad experience is with cauliflower
customer_reviews.text: Keeps fruits and veggies fresh and crisp for so long it's unbelievable! The only bad experience is with cauliflower...it browns at same rate but I don't think the Tupperware are responsible...
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Peplinski

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the storage containers! I've used them for berries and wild mushrooms. They are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: Add extra time to the life of your vegetables
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought one of these from Tupperware and it worked fantastic at keeping our Lettuce from wilting. It got broke so bought the entire set. They make veggies last much longer than just being in the refrigerator. It's nice to have multiple sizes.
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: Greay thing to have
customer_reviews.text: THey are actually amazing. We left one box with cabbage and kale in my boyfriends fridge for a month and we found it fresh and used the veggies for cooking. There were couple of things that didint stay well, but most did amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: Ausra

customer_reviews.title: Great produce Saver
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because it actually works. It keeps my produce from going bad, it’s dishwasher safe and it’s stackable. I RARELY give five stars so yeah, I am impressed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Fridgesmart is so aptly named!
customer_reviews.text: These truly do extend the life of fruits and vegetables in the refrigerator using the the guidelines on the containers.
customer_reviews.author: ScrapbookGirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The price is my only complaint. These keep produce fresh forever!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey777

customer_reviews.title: Money saver
customer_reviews.text: This set is a must! Keeps fruit and veggies fresh longer! Love them.
customer_reviews.author: sja

customer_reviews.title: Freshness matters
customer_reviews.text: Keeps produce unbelievable fresh for a long time. Just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Stephany Roedl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I put veggies in them that would normally last only 3-4 days in the refrigerator, but last over a week and still look perfect in these containers.
customer_reviews.author: DDragon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: If I didn't see it I wouldn't believe these really help your produce stay fresh longer. I just wish I could buy these in glass not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Gen

customer_reviews.title: Food fresh
customer_reviews.text: Does the job if my husband would remember to seal it back up after taking berries out
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Gold

customer_reviews.title: Great for fruit snd veggies
customer_reviews.text: Keeps fruit and veggies fresh for days or even weeks especially lettuce.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Manning

customer_reviews.title: Olive
customer_reviews.text: Great new version of Tupperware, hopeful I will receive one of the missing tops on the 1.8 liter from the seller. thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Olive

customer_reviews.title: This really works to keep veggies fresh. I would ...
customer_reviews.text: This really works to keep veggies fresh. I would say lettuce, for example, lasts 4 times as long as in the crisper drawer in my fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Birdman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have an older version of the fridgesmart that I prefer, but these seem to work OK as well.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Love the containers plus
customer_reviews.text: My food keeps at least a week longer. Example: I bought some mushrooms and put them in my new Fridgesmart Container ...they lasted two weeks....normally I would have used them within 3 days after purchase. Love the containers plus, they are saving me money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: BJstep

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love them!! I am able to keep produce longer without throwing it away due to rotting. This is saving me $$$'s.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Initially these appeared like great products but the lids are very hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: Initially these appeared like great products but the lids are very hard to close and one fell off counter onto kitchen floor and bottom of plastic broke!! The material should be more durable since it is a storage container. These should not break that easily!
customer_reviews.author: Rolo Bernales

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Lids do not fit! If you have arthritis, these will NOT be what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Visitor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they really work. Have been a Tupperware fan for decades.
customer_reviews.author: barinja

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these containers! We can buy produce in bulk and not have to throw any out. Even organic lasts a lot longer. We eat mostly paleo, so pretty much our entire fridge is filled with produce in these containers. It's great not having to shop as often.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: These containers have a slide on the top that regulates how much moisture is retained in the container. They come with a booklet that lets you know which sorts of vegetables and fruits need similar kinds of moisture retention. They keep fresh foods fresh.
customer_reviews.author: HKT

customer_reviews.title: Really helps keep vegetables fresh
customer_reviews.text: I can make 5 days worth of salad with lots of different cut vegetables and it stays fresh. I also cut up and entire head of cauliflower and broccoli after washing and completely drying and it will be ready for steaming during the week. Sort of expensive but worth it if you use a lot of vegetables and hate throwing wilted or browned produce away.
customer_reviews.author: JPC10

customer_reviews.title: Tupperware is the best containers around.
customer_reviews.text: I love Tupperware to keep all my produce so fresh and crisp for twice as long as any other containers. It is the best product out there. I have about all of it. Thank you! Pam Gerdowsky
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S Gerdowsky

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst things I have ever purchased.....Before giving them a fair try, I ordered another set......Food freezes, and rots...I I could get my money back...I WOULD......
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing that the manufacturer has ever come up with
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing that the manufacturer has ever come up with. It extends the life of bagged lettuce by at least 2 weeks. Everything stays fresh and crisp just like you purchased it from the market. They work great for fruit as well as for vegetables!
customer_reviews.author: jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these and the price is right. This really works to keep veggies fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Veggies stay fresh FOREVER!
customer_reviews.text: These are real expensive but they do work great! I've had veggies last 3 to 4 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Denman

customer_reviews.title: improvement over previous fridgesmart
customer_reviews.text: This is such an improvement over the previous release of fridgesmart, They really do make my greens last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these and the price here is great
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these and the price here is great. For someone who lives alone, I need food to last a little longer, and these are great ways to save money on throwing food away.
customer_reviews.author: jweezie

customer_reviews.title: Keeps veggies and fruit fresher longer
customer_reviews.text: These work great to keep vegetables and fruit fresher longer! Love em!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great Containers!
customer_reviews.text: These containers work magic! They extend the life of my produce items more than ever before. I don’t know why they work but they do!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L Schucker

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Read instructions before use to get best results!
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Scallions and lettuce stayed fresh for weeks
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Scallions and lettuce stayed fresh for weeks, even in my old inconsistent temp fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Best buy every!
customer_reviews.text: Love love it ! If you what for your lettuce to stay good! This is it !
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Jones

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't have asked for a better container for my veggies
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't have asked for a better container for my veggies. The Lettuce container is seriously a money saver and has paid for itself!!
customer_reviews.author: Rose D. Snow

customer_reviews.title: so none of it goes to waste. My bell peppers keep for weeks too
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my veggies fresh for a really long time. My iceberg lettuce stays fresh for weeks, so none of it goes to waste. My bell peppers keep for weeks too. Buy these and and you can expect to never waste your produce again.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Great fruit/veggie storage containers to extend fridge time
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these containers, work well to store and gives extended fridge time to fresh fruit and veggies--would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Borger

customer_reviews.title: These perform as expected and that's great. But
customer_reviews.text: These perform as expected and that's great. But, they take up quite a bit of room in my refrigerator and they don't hold very much. I highly recommend them to anyone who doesn't buy for a lot of people.
customer_reviews.author: AGK

customer_reviews.title: Tupperware does not provide custormer service for damaged products!  Do not buy any Tupperware!
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE! Expensive. Lid did not fit. I called tupperware and was told: WE DO NOT PROVIDE SERVICE TO THOSE WHO PURCHASE OUR PRODUCTS THRU AMAZON. Fortunately, Amazon provided a full refund! :)
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Works Well...not amazed
customer_reviews.text: These definately keep produce fresh longer. I did not have as much luck with berries however. I would say maybe a day or two longer than standard packaging.
customer_reviews.author: CKH

customer_reviews.title: Tupperware is the Best
customer_reviews.text: These fridge smart containers are so awesome!! They are fantastic for keeping all my produce fresh! 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower17

customer_reviews.title: Great Price...but be prepared to wait.
customer_reviews.text: Great Price, Everything in Order...but it took too long for me. Fruits and Vegetables don't like to be kept waiting. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Tazgadon

product_meta.title: Tupperware Fridgesmart Container 4 Pcs Set Newest Design
product_meta.description: Includes two 1¾ qt./1.8 L Small Deeps, one 1 gal./4.4 L Medium Deep and one 1¾qt./1.8 L Medium In Margarita/Snow White/Wintergreen Dishwasher Safe Limited Lifetime Warranty, BPA Free
